title: Sharing Your Love
text:
Sharing Your Love is the third studio album by the Italian/U.S. ensemble <a href="Change%20%28band%29">Change</a>. It was released in 1982 and reached number sixty-six on the US "Billboard" <a href="Billboard%20200">Album Chart</a> and fourteen on the US "Billboard" <a href="Top%20R%26amp%3BB/Hip-Hop%20Albums">Black Albums</a> chart. "Sharing Your Love" includes the <a href="single%20%28music%29">singles</a> "The Very Best in You", "<a href="December%2C%201963%20%28Oh%2C%20What%20a%20Night%29">Oh What a Night</a>", "Sharing Your Love", "Hard Times (It's Gonna Be Alright)" and "Keep On It" (in Italy only).
The band recorded the songs for album at Mediasound Studios, New York City. The sessions were then mastered at Sterling Sound Studios. Receiving mixed to positive reviews the album was originally released as an <a href="LP%20album">LP</a> in April 1982. The artwork was designed by Greg Porto.
Reception.
"Sharing Your Love" received mixed to positive reviews by the majority of critics.
Personnel.
Recorded at Mediasound Studios, NY. Mastered at Sterling Sound, NY.
